fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Royalty: You start with 6 HP and 6 cards. Your hand limit is 6.
- Paranoia: You only have 1 channel. You cannot participate in Duels.
- Certainty: Your role is revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your true role, will show up as "King" as well.
- Mutually Exclusive: The Overlord will not spawn if you are in the game.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Block! an attack. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Heal 1 HP. Cleanse an effect off of you of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using cards in the next phase. [2 uses, 4 CD]
*Note: The Order King only has one use of this.*
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters this Night phase. [1 use]
- Influential: When activated, your vote counts as double this phase. You will be immune to negative votes. [2 uses, 2 CD]
